headline: Lanvin Group Announces Appointment of New Chief Financial Officer
summary: Lanvin Group (NYSE: LANV), a global luxury fashion group, today announced the appointment of Mr. Jiyang Han as Chief Financial Officer (CFO) of the Company, effective November 1, 2025. In this role, Mr. Han will oversee the Group's financial affairs, including financial planning and analysis, accounting and controllership, financial management, treasury, investment and financing projects, and investor relations.
